response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance to both of us. This exceptional item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at this exclusive price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer represents an opportunity for you to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable discount, while also allowing me to maximize the value of the product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 950000}
